description.en: A trusted SMM platform to skyrocket your social media engagement. Get followers, likes, and views instantly and safely.
description.id: Platform SMM terpercaya buat lo yang mau panjat sosial! Nambah followers, likes, views aman & instan. Solusi rahasia biar akun sosmed lo makin hits.

technologies: React, Node.js, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, AOS.js

description.en: Official website for the Chika Idol Group from Tulungagung. I serve as the web development staff, ensuring fans stay updated.
description.id: Official website buat Chika Idol Group asal Tulungagung. Di sini gue berperan sebagai staff pengembang web-nya, mastiin fans bisa update info idola mereka dengan lancar jaya.

technologies: React, Node.js, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, AOS.js

description.en: A local fashion brand from Mojokerto selling exclusive t-shirts and tote bags. I am proud to be one of the owners of this venture.
description.id: Brand fashion lokal dari Mojokerto yang baru mulai merintis, fokus ke kaos dan totebag desain eksklusif. Sebagai salah satu owner, gue selalu mastiin tiap produk punya kualitas bahan dan detail yang maksimal buat kalian.

technologies: React, Node.js, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, AOS.js
